formAttributeDefinitions.name: Parent Console Slug
formAttributeDefinitions.description: Set on forms of type Subconsole. Defines the parent console form of this subconsole.

categoryAttributeDefinitions.name: Parent
categoryAttributeDefinitions.description: Used by the Category Console to store the parent of this category.

categoryAttributeDefinitions.name: Sort Order
categoryAttributeDefinitions.description: Used by the Category Console to store the sort order of this category.

userAttributeDefinitions.name: Group
userAttributeDefinitions.description: Used by the Group Management console to store the groups that this user is part of.

forms.name: Categories
forms.description: An advanced console for managing categories and subcategories in a hierarchical view.

forms.name: Datastore
forms.description: A Datastore is a Kinetic Request form that can be used to store data for use in other applications or forms. The data can be accessed using bridges.

forms.name: Group
forms.description: Form to store the group data.

forms.name: Group Management
forms.description: Allows for creation and management of groups and their members.

forms.name: Messages
forms.description: Datastore for programmatically created messages to the user

events.name: Add Kapp Options

forms.name: Translation Entries
forms.description: Store the translation entries from the translation console.

pattern.message: Locale must be a valid locale code.

constraints.message: Key must be less than or equal to 256 characters.

pattern.message: Tombstone value must be empty or "Yes".

forms.name: Translation Events
forms.description: Stores events from the translation console used to maintain a fresh cache.

forms.name: Translation Settings
forms.description: Stores settings used by the translation console.

forms.name: Translations
forms.description: Stores translations used to localize the contest display to a user based on the user's preferred locale.

forms.name: User Management
forms.description: Allows for creation and management of users and their properties and attributes.

forms.name: System Management
forms.description: Allows for management of Space Attributes.

forms.name: Form Management
forms.description: Console for managing forms within the system.
